welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Selsey, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport is dedicated to handling private and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
